amendment.description: Amendment requires that foreign owned corporations or individuals that hold grazing permits pay the higher of either the State grazing fee or the fee charged for grazing on private land.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to modify the grazing fee formulas for permits held or controlled by a foreign corporation or individual. The amendment would require foreign permit-holders to pay a rate equal either to (1) the average grazing fee charged by the state on state-owned lands, or (2) the average private grazing fee in the state where the federal lands are located, whichever is higher.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (CA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
